title: 2/2 In Travis Heights on Major Road With Nightlife
posting_body: 🚨 Fantastic location in Austin with hottest spots outside your door.
🏊‍♀️ Resort-style swimming pool / grilling stations
🐕 Pet friendly community with multiple dog park areas with lounging in nature this close to the city!
🏋️ Gym center with great selection of equipment.
OR walk out your doors to a high-end gym with impeccable service.
